name: Tombfist
explicitMods: Has 1 Abyssal Socket
5% increased maximum Life
With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Maim Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: "Ever watched a man crush another man's skull?
Hard to feel hope after that."

explicitMods: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Current modifiers are retained and a new one is added.

explicitMods: Randomises the numeric values of the implicit modifiers of an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click another item to apply it.
Cross Navali's palm with silver to receive a prophecy.

explicitMods: Randomises the numeric values of the random modifiers on an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic, rare or unique item to apply it.

explicitMods: Reforges the links between sockets on an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more links.

explicitMods: Enchants a magic item with a new random modifier
descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Magic items can have up to two random modifiers.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alteration.
Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with up to four linked sockets
descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a flask
descrText: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity flasks. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers
descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.
A stack of 5 fragments becomes a Scroll of Wisdom.
Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a Strongbox
descrText: Right click this item then left click a Strongbox to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity Strongboxes. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers
descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.

explicitMods: Identifies an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity
descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a weapon
descrText: Right click this item then left click a weapon to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity weapons. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Binding.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Engineer's Orb.

explicitMods: Removes all modifiers from an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.
Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps.
Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation.

explicitMods: Grants a passive skill refund point
descrText: Right click on this item to use it.

explicitMods: Reforges the number of sockets on an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more sockets.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of an armour
descrText: Right click this item then left click an armour to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity armours. The maximum quality is 20%.
Trade coins to Cadiro Perandus.

explicitMods: Creates a portal to town
descrText: Right click on this item to use it.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a map
descrText: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity maps. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a gem
descrText: Right click this item then left click a gem to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item
descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it.

explicitMods: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably
descrText: Right click this item then left click an item to corrupt it. Corrupted items cannot be modified again.
Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps.
Can be combined with other Oils at Cassia to Enchant Rings or Amulets, or to modify Blighted Maps.

explicitMods: <magicitem>{Life Armour}
flavourText: From death, life.
From life, death.
The wheel turns,
and the corbies wheel overhead.

explicitMods: <divination>{Divination Card}
flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

explicitMods:
<rareitem>{Ring}
<default>{Item Level:} <normal>{100}
flavourText: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

explicitMods:
<whiteitem>{Six-Link Imperial Bow}
<default>{Item Level:} <normal>{100}
flavourText: A life lost, A legacy born.

explicitMods: <uniqueitem>{Axe}
flavourText: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

explicitMods: <uniqueitem>{Kiara's Determination}
flavourText: <size:27>{A wanderer in the wild strives
Against countless foes he survives
A fool pursues a quest contrived
By the gift of the witch, alive.}

explicitMods: <whiteitem>{Prismatic Ring}
flavourText: <size:31>{A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.}

explicitMods:
<whiteitem>{Five-Link Staff}
<default>{Item Level:} <normal>{66}
flavourText: Sturdy and strong,
grown from the stream.
The Flora that live here,
A combatant's dream.

explicitMods: <currencyitem>{Chaos Orb}
flavourText: <size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night
Chaos reigned
Where the shards fell
All was destroyed
-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}

explicitMods:
<gemitem>{Superior Vaal Gem}
<default>{Quality:} <augmented>{+20%}
<corrupted>{Corrupted}
flavourText: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

explicitMods:
<normal>{Map}
<default>{Map Tier:} <normal>{5}
flavourText: <size:28>{A map is similar
to a pair of eyes,
without one you stumble
around, unable to find your way.}

explicitMods:
<gemitem>{Superior Gem}
<default>{Quality:} <augmented>{+20%}
flavourText: <size:29>{"I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter}

explicitMods: <currencyitem>{5x Currency}
flavourText: The house always wins.

explicitMods: <currencyitem>{40x Scroll of Wisdom}
flavourText: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

explicitMods: <uniqueitem>{Belly of the Beast}
flavourText: To know the monster, you must become the monster.

descrText: Travel to the Aspirants' Plaza and spend this item to open the Eternal Labyrinth. You must have completed the six different Trials of Ascendancy found in Maps in order to access this area.
flavourText: It is time for the Goddess to give her final verdict.
Your fate rests in her even hands.

explicitMods: Area contains an additional Breach
descrText: Can be used in the Templar Laboratory or a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Ember-dwellers sought to throw you to their volcanic god, young Omid,
but we caught you instead. The Order of the Djinn is your tribe now.

descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create Xoph's Breachstone.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains an additional Red Beast
descrText: Can be used in the Templar Laboratory or a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Feuding Ezomytes slaughtered your kin, young Agnar, but we pulled you
from the flames. The Order of the Djinn is your clan now.

descrText: Can be used in the Templar Laboratory or a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us into the light.

descrText: Can be used in the Templar Laboratory or a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The light without pales in comparison to the light within.

descrText: Can be used in the Templar Laboratory or a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The Vaal shall never fear the setting of our sun.

descrText: Can be used in the Templar Laboratory or a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Only those who aspire can dare to hope.

descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Karui Emblem.

secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 20% more Chaos Damage

descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

secDescrText: Channels to build up a large explosion, which is released when you stop using the skill. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion, up to 10 stages.
explicitMods: Deals 31 to 46 Fire Damage
110% more Spell Damage for each stage
90% more Damage with Ailments for each stage
8% increased Damage
+5% chance to Ignite for each Stage
descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Deals 31 to 46 Fire Damage
110% more Spell Damage for each stage
90% more Damage with Ailments for each stage
8% increased Damage
+5% chance to Ignite for each Stage
-1 to Radius for each Stage
hybrid.secDescrText: Targets an area and builds up stages in that area based on cast speed. It explodes every 5 stages, until it reaches a maximum of 15. As it gains more stages, the area gets smaller but the damage gets higher.

secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Mine lasts 5 seconds
Supported Skills have 4% increased Mine Throwing Speed
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Supported Skills deal 30% less Damage
Each Mine from Supported Skills applies 2% chance to deal Double Damage to Hits against Enemies near it, up to a maximum of 100%
descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
